question: Which of the following statements is true about the origin of Puranas?
option1: Purans have a divine origin as the breath of the Great Being
option2: Vyasa is the arranger of existing material into eighteen Puranas
explanation: According to historian Thomas Coburn, Puranas and early extra-puranic texts trace to two traditions regarding their origin, one proclaims a divine origin as the breath of the Great Being, the other as a human named Vyasa as the arranger of already existing material into eighteen Puranas.
